review_text:
Just a note to tell you how pleased we are with your company.
The guys that were here were very professional, courteous, and polite.
They put down mats to protect the kitchen floor and when they removed the mats, they swept the floor!
We will certain be recommending your company to family and friends!

Leon & Joyce
Brockville

key_phrases: mats to protect the kitchen floor

review_text: I personally have had two roofs done by A&I, and in my family we have had several more. Never had an issue, always great service and great work. Thanks.

In March 2025 Confident Coatings repaired, refreshed, and re-coated the stucco on my 14 year old house. The ownership was very responsive to my initial call and subsequent queries. He answered all my questions thoroughly and ensured I understood my options. The Confident Coatings team did an outstanding job  and made the house look new. They were quick and professional. The workers cleaned up all materials in the area. I was very impressed. Even my neighbors expressed what a great job Confident Coatings did on my house. In addition to the superb work, Confident Coatings was reasonably priced. I am very pleased with the results, would recommend them to everyone, and would use them again. I give Confident Coatings an A+ in all areas.
Mace was very professional, personable and knowledgeable. He was punctual and a pleasure to work with. I would definitely recommend not only hom but your company to others.

key_phrases: Mace was very professional, personable and knowledgeable
punctual and a pleasure to work with

review_text: I have had the pleasure of contracting The Cleaning Room for over a decade. They are completely professional and always go the extra mile.

Divine landscaping is AWESOME!!! Very professional (and also so patient when I was running late to put my dogs away)
They do beautiful work!
Thank you, Divine, for your help today!

key_phrases: patient when I was running late

review_text: This is very professional company . They did very good job doing my driveway. I highly recommended this company.
Rusin was very timely and professional. I would highly recommend.
Once again we were very pleased with MasterMaid! Natalya spent over 3 hours meticulously cleaning our 2-BR apartment, including a deep clean of the dishwasher. Well worth the $.
Good service, exactly what the apartment needed after moving out. Landlords happy.

key_phrases: exactly what the apartment needed after moving out

review_text: I found Stucco The Springs through a google search. I needed to hire a contractor to mostly redo my backyard, and this was the first place I came across. I decided to go with their services because they seemed like they had a good reputation and were reasonably priced. I was very happy with their work and with their customer service too. I am happy that I found a contractor I can trust!

ASM Build Group gave us a complete backyard transformation with a beautiful paver patio, retaining walls, and garden beds. They also updated our front porch with natural stone steps and glass railings, creating an elegant and welcoming entryway.

The team was incredibly hardworking, detail-oriented, and meticulous in their craftsmanship. They worked efficiently and on schedule while taking great care in every aspect of the project. We’re thrilled with the results and would highly recommend ASM Build Group to anyone looking for quality, professionalism, and exceptional workmanship.

I was so happy with the service I received.  The cleaners showed up exactly at their stated time and got to work right away.  Everything was sparkling and smelled so good after they were finished.  I have a very furry dog so I was impressed at how they managed to get all the pet hair out of my living-room carpet.  It was super easy to book and the cleaners were very professional and kind.  I have booked to have them return again in future.

key_phrases: managed to get all the pet hair out

review_text:
We had a gas fireplace installed by Mike (the owner) and his guys. We were told by a few other fireplace retailers that all we could get was a small insert, but Mike removed our old gas log set and housing and put in a full gas fireplace (see the before and after pictures). It fills the whole space and has a much larger viewing area than a small insert would have. Mike is talented at updating and retrofitting and does his best to make sure things come out  right.

There was some delay in the project due to ordering and delivery taking longer than expected, but that was fairly well communicated. In the grand scheme of things, the delay was not a big deal because the work was well done. The storefront staff are polite and helpful and the pricing is competitive. In the future, we will return to Mike and Front Range to have our other gas log fireplace updated.

I recently hired them for a cleaning session prior to a move. After seeing all the positive Google reviews, I was elated they were able to clean on such short notice but I left the experience with over $300 out-of-pocket for a service I could have done myself & an angering interaction with Leo.

Positives:
- Very communicative
- Polite cleaner
- Prompt
- Cleaned windows well

Cons:
- For a "deep clean", seems very sparse on the amount of supplies brought to the unit.
- The same Swiffer mop cover was used for the floor in addition to the walls & windows (very unhygienic)
- I indicated before the booking to Leo that I had hardwood floors so the appropriate solutions were brought, nothing was applied & the floors were just cleaned/mopped with water
- My family member was in the unit & let me know about the lack of cleaning with the oven & unit. I called Leo an hour in & he was very unpleasant to speak to. He condescendingly told me that I should have waited till the end of the cleaning to provide feedback. Which I did not do for a few of reasons:
1. The cleaner was already on site & my family member was there for the sake of organizing some things around the home & letting the cleaner in & needed to be elsewhere later on
2. I had no idea if the cleaner had a booking afterwards & could not afford for her to come back later on, disrespect her schedule &  we were moving in the next day so did not have time for them to come back.
3. Despite him saying "you should wait until she's finished", the cleaner was going room-by-room, so by the time she left to start cleaning another room, she was completed cleaning the prior, which seems more than fair for someone to provide feedback on at that point.

Leo then proceeded to tell me that the cleaner communicated my family member was "following her around the unit, making her uncomfortable & preventing her from doing her job", which was infuriating considering the only time my family member was in the same room with her was when she was cleaning the windows as my family member VERY kindly held aside all the curtains for her so they would not get wet with water or get in the way when the cleaner was cleaning. The way he spoke about my family member was completely unacceptable & truly disgusting behaviour.

There were also issues with the oven not being cleaned properly & issues with rust. That being said, the issues with rust did not in-fact turn out to be solvable that day & Leo (to his credit), did provide clear information & updates on this (via text with video & pictures). That being said, it's worth noting, when the cleaner went back a second time & was asked to actually wipe down the inside of the oven (which I PAID EXTRA for in the booking), she seemed surprised it was even dirty despite "cleaning" it already. & when she was circling back to it, Leo had texted his cleaner was "looking into it" when she had already apparently finished cleaning it, which I had responded "she should have caught the first time". Also ironic given that he had just yelled prior on the phone about not giving feedback until the end despite her working room-by-room.

Lastly, despite it being only a 2 bed, 2 bath, & indicating it was within the range of 900+ sq ft on the booking website, the website did not suggest extra time. I can appreciate the cleaner did stay a little over time most likely to having to "re-clean" the oven (could have been avoided if she did it the first time) but she did not end up cleaning a whole room & bathroom after 4.5 hours at the unit (950 sq feet) which is wild considering the lack of cleaning that was done & how the unit was already was in "good" shape.

Recommendation: Do NOT hire Toronto Shine Cleaning, there are better people suited for the job.
Excellent response time, affordable and honest.  We are so happy with the service.
Stepping Stones Foster Care uses Rob as our HVAC go to guy and he always arrives promptly and gets the job done.  We appreciate and value our relationship with him.
I had a fantastic experience with their service! My chimney looks immaculate, and the team was incredibly detailed in their work. I can't recommend them enough

Jacob was on time, and very friendly and professional. Replaced 2 sprinkler heads, plus something else I don't know the name of, got everything turned on and some zoning issues resolved. Couldn't have asked for better service or a better price. Will definitely use again if I run into any more problems, and would highly recommend for anyone who needs sprinkler work done! I also appreciate that he didn't try to sell me on anything or replace things that didn't need replacing just to get more money. Overall we are very happy with the service provided.

key_phrases: didn't try to sell me on anything

review_text: Excellent service

We had a partial reroof and shingle replacement on a building just shy of 500,000 sqft, and Bumble didn't drop a detail the entire time. Our insurance company was pleased with the work, the owners are absolute delights, and I have literally no notes of complaints in the least. They even gave us drone footage of the job after done to spare us having to climb on the roof, haha.

We are disappointed with the radon mitigation for our home in late 2022. The sales pitch was great but the communication that followed was really unpleasant. No show on the install date and a tough time communicating with the office before and after the installation. The plan we agreed to was deemed not possible once the installers (who were great) arrived. Our radon is lower, but still regularly well over 100 which is much higher than what we were promised.

key_phrases: no show on the install date
radon is lower, but still regularly well over 100

review_text: The best in the biz.

Matt of Jetski Landscaping is the BEST!  Our current sprinkler system needed updating. Matt and his crew were here the next day, and so very impressed with his dependability, pricing, and knowledge.  We highly recommend Matt for any of your landscaping needs.

I have expirinced excellent customer service with RC Home Improvements! They're committed to giving the best service to our families and our community. This is a priority in their business. I really recommend RC Home Improvements to your family and your home!

SR

They did an amazing job. The crew was very professional and always asked us if we had any questions during the process. We were really happy with the final product. We recommended them to our neighbors!

key_phrases: professional and always asked us if we had any questions

review_text: These guys are top notch. Tristan and his staff are friendly, knowledgeable and efficient. I've referred them to multiple friends and family, and they've received the same level of service. Complete satisfaction in my book!

There is nothing, I mean it nothing , bad that could be said about
quality

Would I recommend ?  Yes   of course I would
Thank You
They fix my dryer vent schedule them same day good service good people highly recommended
Rosa was excellent and friendly. Great work ethic and would definitely book again.

My furnace started having a problem early on a Monday morning. Scott Home Comfort is open at 6:30am - I called, he came right away and we replaced the broken impeller on the inducer motor and the problem was solved. Would recommend giving him a call next time your heat / AC stops working properly. Good pricing considering timing and season.

Thank you for your quick turnaround time .
We booked a disinfecting clean/electrostatic spray with your company. We now feel safe to move into our new home .

review_text: Did not complete the work on time, did not complete the work as contracted. Would not use every again. Have had to get a lawyer involved to resolve.

review_text: Jon and team did a fantastic job painting the exterior of our house and adding decorative stone around the foundation line. The work we had done was affordable, quality work done within a couple of weeks from the time we contacted them. Everyone was professional and polite. We are very happy with the way our home looks and I would highly recommend Kelley Girl to anyone looking to improve their home!
Very professional. Hard working guys. Great work. Highly recommended
RC Home improvements did an amazing job of repairing the stucco on the north side of our garage. The texture and color match are perfect! We will definitely be using them again!

key_phrases: texture and color match are perfect

review_text: Would be nice if you would update your hours before people drive 45 minutes to look at a fireplace to find you are closed inside business hours.

I'm old and grumpy so nobody in my world gets five stars.  FX redid my front yard.  I get many compliments on the "Large Boulders" they put in and the imitation meandering stream they created using "Arizona River Rock".  Combine those effects with the vegetation they used created a very pleasant effect.  I would use the words creative, punctual and fair to describe this company.
If you need work done on your house call Jon. He’s the man!
Mace did an awesome job on my chimney. Showed up on time, was efficient, and honest. Highly recommended!
Thank you, from West Hamilton Mountain

I am extremely pleased with toronto shine cleaning. My place was spotless and I had received more than I expected. The person who cleaned my apartment was silent while I worked and completely thorough. I will be using them again!

This company has done 3 different jobs for us at 2 different houses. We have also referred them to friends & everyone has been extremely satisfied. They do amazing work and have a great crew. We highly recommend!! Disregard the 1 star rating from the 'neighbour' below.
Steven was awesome to work with!
Great cleaning job we were extremely impressed! Professional, timely and a really good clean. I have used many cleaning services in Toronto and this one is the best I’ve tried!
We have been using Master maid for years and I have referred them to many people. Great service!! thank you!!
I’ve use this service monthly and have never been disappointed when I get home from work. They get all the spots you need and ensure it’s clean to your standards! Highly recommend.
Had a good first experience with Master Maids. Cleaner was on time, super nice to my goofy dog, and did a great job. Will use them again.

key_phrases: super nice to my goofy dog

review_text: Reached out to Accent Landscapes for a landscape design for our retirement home build in Cordera.  Roger Haywood asked for some information to get an idea of what we were specifically looking for.  We had no idea since we never had a home built and didn’t know what would really grow here.  Roger and his landscape designer took a draft landscape plan that I had developed and helped us transform the plan that would meet Cordera HOA rules and regulations.  We had a very specific budget since we used a lot of our additional money for upgrades inside our new home.  Within two weeks he sent us a proposed design with some very beautiful trees and foliage that would really enhance our yard.  Roger was very professional and patient with us since as I kept making change after change during the process.  He was very quick to respond when called or emailed.  Highly recommend Accent Landscapes for all your design and install needs regardless of what neighborhood you are purchasing a spec home or a new build.  We will definitely reach out to Accent for all our future landscape design needs.  I spoke with about 11 other landscapers in the area, some of who said my budget (40K) was too small for their services, but not one time did Accent Lanscapes say anything about our budget.  Thanks Roger for all that you have done for us.  We cannot wait to see the design come to life in a couple of months.

key_phrases: budget (40K) was too small for their services

review_text: Rob came quickly and sorted out the problem with my gas fireplace. His rate for the work was very reasonable. He worked carefully and thoroughly and was respectful of my property. I will not hesitate to call him again if I need help with the fireplace.

key_phrases: rate for the work was very reasonable
